sen.j: 伊弉諾神社（いざなぎじんじゃ）は奈良県生駒市にある神社。
sen.e: Izanagi-jinja Shrine is located in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Izanagi-jinja Shrine is located in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Izanagi-jinja Shrine is located in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 長弓寺の鎮守神で、その境内に鎮座する。
sen.e: It is enshrined in the precincts of Chokyu-ji Temple as its guardian god.
It stands within the precinct of Chokyu-ji Temple as its guardian god.
It stands within the precinct of Chokyu-ji Temple as its guardian god.

sen.j: 延喜式神名帳の添下郡の伊射奈岐神社に比定されるが、同郡の登弥神社とする説もある。
sen.e: Although the shrine is identified as Izanagi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun in the Engishiki jimmyocho (a register of shrines in Japan), it is also said to have been identified as Tomi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun.

Although the shrine is identified as Izanagi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun in the Engishiki Junmyocho (a register of shrines in Japan), it is also said to have been identified as Tomi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun.

Although the shrine is identified as Izanagi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun in the Engishiki Jinmyocho (a register of shrines in Japan), it is also said to have been identified as Tomi-jinja Shrine in Soejimo-gun.

sen.j: 天平18年（746年）の長弓寺創建にあたり、鎮守神として牛頭天王を大宮、八王子社を若宮に祀ったという。
sen.e: It is said to have enshrined Gozu Tenno at Omiya and Hachioji-sha Shrine at Wakamiya as the guardian gods when Chokyu-ji Temple was founded in 746.
It is said to have enshrined Gozu Tenno at Omiya and Hachioji-sha Shrine at Wakamiya as the guardian gods when Chokyu-ji Temple was founded in 746.
It is said to have enshrined Gozu Tenno at Omiya and Hachioji-sha Shrine at Wakamiya as the guardian gods when Chokyu-ji Temple was founded in 746.

sen.j: 貞観 (日本)元年（859年）に従五位下から従五位に昇叙したことが記述されている。
sen.e: It is described that the shrine promoted from Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade to Junior Fifth Rank in 859.
It is described that the shrine promoted from Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade to Junior Fifth Rank in 859.
It is described that the shrine promoted from Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade to Junior Fifth Rank in 859.

sen.j: 牛頭天王社とも称し、江戸時代まで寺僧の第一臈が神職を務めた。
sen.e: It was also referred to as Gozu-Tenno-sha Shrine and the daiichiro (the first rank) of the temple priest had served as a Shinto priest until the Edo period.
It was also referred to as Gozu-Tenno-sha Shrine and the daiichiro (the first rank) of the temple priest had served as a Shinto priest until the Edo period.
It was also referred to as Gozu-Tenno-sha Shrine and the daiichiro (the first rank) of the temple priest had served as a Shinto priest until the Edo period.

sen.j: また、文明_(日本)6年（1474年）の火災の記録がある。
sen.e: Moreover, there is a record of a fire in 1474.
Moreover, there is a record of a fire in 1474.
Moreover, there is a record of a fire in 1474.

sen.j: 寺の総門前の鳥居が境内を総括し、境内には桃山時代の石灯籠がある。
sen.e: The torii (an archway to a Shinto shrine) located in front of the temple's main gate overviews its precincts and there is a stone lantern made in the Momoyama period.
The torii (an archway to a Shinto shrine) located in front of the temple's main gate overviews its precinct and there is a stone lantern made in the Momoyama period.
The torii (an archway to a Shinto shrine) located in front of the temple's main gate overviews its precinct and there is a stone lantern made in the Momoyama period.

sen.j: 近鉄奈良線富雄駅より奈良交通バス（高山方面行き）「生駒上町」下車、徒歩10分
sen.e: Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Takayama) from Tomio Station on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Ikomakamimachi' and walk for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Takayama) from Tomio Station on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Ikomakamimachi' and walk for 10 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Takayama) from Tomio Station on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Ikomakamimachi' and walk for 10 minutes.

sen.j: 近鉄奈良線学園前駅 (奈良県)より奈良交通バス（学研北生駒駅行き）「真弓4丁目」下車、徒歩15分
sen.e: Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Gakken-Kita-Ikoma Station) from Gakuenmae Station (Nara Prefecture) on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Mayumi yon-chome' and walk for 15 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Gakken-Kita-Ikoma Station) from Gakuenmae Station (Nara Prefecture) on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Mayumi yon-chome' and walk for 15 minutes.
Take the Nara Kotsu Bus (towards Gakken-Kita-Ikoma Station) from Gakuenmae Station (Nara Prefecture) on the Kintetsu Nara Line to 'Mayumi yon-chome' and walk for 15 minutes.
